system.description: Effect: When the user has an Engulfed creature equipped as a [Stash] item, they can launch the Engulfed creature as part of Gulp Missile. When the Engulfed creature is launched, this Attack's Power increases to 90, the Attack's Type changes to a Type possessed by the launched creature, and the launched creature takes the damage of the attack, resisted two steps. When launching a Engulfed creature, Gulp Missile has a 20% chance to reduce the target's DEF stage by -1 on hit, a 20% chance to reduce SPDEF stage by -1 on hit, and a 20% chance to inflict Paralysis 5 on hit.

When launching a Engulfed creature, Gulp Missile has a 20% chance to reduce the target's DEF stage by -1 on hit, a 20% chance to reduce SPDEF stage by -1 on hit, and a 20% chance to inflict Paralysis 5 on hit.
